synopsis.text: Shion and Rui are best friends and skilled at seducing women. One night, Shion is unknowingly drugged by a mysterious woman and transforms into a woman when he wakes up. Rui searches for his missing friend, but fails to recognize Shion in his new female form. Instead, Rui begins flirting with the female Shion, unaware that it is actually his best friend. As Shion adjusts to his sudden gender transformation, he finds that Rui is surprisingly adept at pleasuring a woman. Their already close friendship takes an intimate new turn. This comedic, erotic anime explores gender roles and sexuality through Shion and Rui's unpredictable predicament. Their bizarre encounter forces them to view their relationship and identities in an entirely new light. Full of humor and steamy scenes, "Seduced by My Best Friend" offers a fun, provocative take on friendship, gender-bending, and sexuality.
